text: "Straight from the Heart" is a 1983 song by Canadian singer Bryan Adams. It is the leading single from his third studio album Cuts Like a Knife. It went to number 10 in the United States, number 20 in Canada, number 51 in the United Kingdom and number 90 in Australia. They have been versions by Jon English and Bonnie Tyler. title: Straight from the Heart (Bryan Adams song)
